description: Dashboard for the gantrycrane validation demo

targets.rawSql:
SELECT ts, value as "Real-world measurement"
FROM measurement 
WHERE machine_id = $machine_id 
  AND quantity = $quantity 
  AND run_id = $run_id;

SELECT ts, 
MIN(value) as "Simulation minimum", 
MAX(value) as "Simulation maximum", 
AVG(value) as "Simulation average"
FROM simulationdatapoint
WHERE machine_id = $machine_id 
  AND quantity = $quantity 
  AND run_id = $run_id 
GROUP BY ts;

select ts, value as "target trajectory"
from trajectory 
WHERE machine_id = $machine_id 
and quantity = $quantity  
and run_id = $run_id;

SELECT run_id, quantity, MIN(distance), AVG(distance), unit  
FROM rootmeansquarederror, quantity 
where name = 'position' and quantity  = name and run_id = $run_id 
GROUP BY run_id, quantity, unit 
ORDER BY run_id DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 50

SELECT run_id, quantity, MIN(distance), AVG(distance), unit  
FROM rootmeansquarederror, quantity 
where name = 'velocity' and quantity  = name and run_id = $run_id 
GROUP BY run_id, quantity, unit 
ORDER BY run_id DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 50

SELECT run_id, quantity, MIN(distance), AVG(distance), unit  
FROM rootmeansquarederror, quantity 
where name = 'angular position' and quantity  = name and run_id = $run_id 
GROUP BY run_id, quantity, unit 
ORDER BY run_id DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 50

SELECT run_id, quantity, MIN(distance), AVG(distance), unit  
FROM rootmeansquarederror, quantity 
where name = 'angular velocity' and quantity  = name and run_id = $run_id 
GROUP BY run_id, quantity, unit 
ORDER BY run_id DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 50

SELECT run_id, quantity, MIN(distance), MAX(distance), AVG(distance), unit  FROM rootmeansquarederror, quantity where quantity  = name GROUP BY run_id, quantity, unit ORDER BY run_id DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 50
SELECT ts, quantity, distance as "$quantity RMSE", unit FROM rootmeansquarederror, quantity WHERE quantity = $quantity and run_id = $run_id and quantity = name;
SELECT ts, quantity, distance as "$quantity Normalized Euclidean distance", unit FROM normalizedeuclideandistance, quantity WHERE quantity = $quantity and run_id = $run_id and quantity = name;

SELECT run_id, quantity, MIN(distance), Max(distance), AVG(distance), unit  
FROM normalizedeuclideandistance, quantity 
where name = 'position' and quantity  = name and run_id = $run_id 
GROUP BY run_id, quantity, unit 
ORDER BY run_id DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 50

SELECT run_id, quantity, MIN(distance), AVG(distance), unit  
FROM normalizedeuclideandistance, quantity 
where name = 'velocity' and quantity  = name and run_id = $run_id 
GROUP BY run_id, quantity, unit 
ORDER BY run_id DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 50

SELECT run_id, quantity, MIN(distance), AVG(distance), unit  
FROM normalizedeuclideandistance, quantity 
where name = 'angular position' and quantity  = name and run_id = $run_id 
GROUP BY run_id, quantity, unit 
ORDER BY run_id DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 50

SELECT run_id, quantity, MIN(distance), AVG(distance), unit  
FROM normalizedeuclideandistance, quantity 
where name = 'angular velocity' and quantity  = name and run_id = $run_id 
GROUP BY run_id, quantity, unit 
ORDER BY run_id DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 50

SELECT run_id, quantity, MIN(distance), MAX(distance), AVG(distance), unit  FROM normalizedeuclideandistance, quantity where quantity  = name GROUP BY run_id, quantity, unit ORDER BY run_id DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 50

SELECT run_id, quantity, MIN(distance), MAX(distance), AVG(distance), unit  FROM totalnormalizedeuclideandistance, quantity where quantity  = name GROUP BY run_id, quantity, unit ORDER BY run_id DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 50

select run_id, quantity, distance
from mahalanobisdistance
WHERE machine_id = 1
order by run_id DESC, quantity ASC
LIMIT 50;
SELECT ts, quantity, mu_lower, mu_upper, unit FROM frequentistmetric, quantity WHERE quantity = $quantity and run_id = $run_id and quantity = name;
SELECT ts, quantity, error_lower, error_upper, unit FROM frequentistmetric, quantity WHERE quantity = $quantity and run_id = $run_id and quantity = name;

select run_id, quantity, average_relative_error, average_relative_confidence_indicator, maximum_relative_error
from globalfrequentistmetric 
WHERE machine_id = 1
order by run_id DESC, quantity ASC
LIMIT 50;

list.definition: select machine_id from machine where name = $machine;
list.name: machine_id
list.query: select machine_id from machine where name = $machine;

list.definition: select run_id from run where machine_id = (select machine_id from machine where name = '$machine')
list.name: run_id
list.query: select run_id from run where machine_id = (select machine_id from machine where name = '$machine')

list.definition: select num_replications from simulation where machine_id = $machine_id and run_id = $run_id;
list.name: num_replications
list.query: select num_replications from simulation where machine_id = $machine_id and run_id = $run_id;

list.definition: select replication_nr from simulationdatapoint where machine_id = $machine_id and run_id = $run_id;
list.name: replication_nr
list.query: select replication_nr from simulationdatapoint where machine_id = $machine_id and run_id = $run_id;

title: gantrycrane
